measured_by: slope of regression in the Coin Task
justification: “To estimate participants reliance on likelihood relative to prior information, we fitted a linear regression … the slope … indicates how much each participant relies on likelihood information.”
construct: reliance on likelihood relative to prior information / precision weighting (sensory weight)

justification: “Prior to completing the coin task, participants completed the likelihood-only estimation task as a measure of subjective likelihood variance or sensory noise.”

measured_by: calculation using sensory weight and objective likelihood variance in the Coin Task
justification: “To estimate participants subjective model of where each thrower would throw the coin (subjective prior variance)… the sensory weight … can be rearranged as follows: σ_p^2 = σ_l^2 * (1 – w).”
